question: Does the child make eye contact with others?
Does the child respond to their name when called?
Does the child show interest in playing with other children?
Does the child engage in repetitive behaviors like hand-flapping?
Does the child enjoy playing simple social games (e.g., peek-a-boo)?
Does the child point at things to show interest (e.g., pointing at an airplane in the sky)?
Does the child imitate facial expressions, gestures, or movements?
Does the child respond when you try to get their attention?
Does the child show unusual sensitivity to sounds, textures, or lights?
Does the child have an unusual attachment to routines and get upset by small changes?
Does the child talk or communicate as expected for their age?
Does the child play pretend games (e.g., pretending to cook, drive a car, etc.)?
Does the child repeat words or phrases out of context (e.g., echolalia)?
Does the child have difficulty understanding emotions or social cues?
Does the child prefer to play alone rather than with others?
